changeSet.author: CONNECT_APP
changeSet.sql:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.ESHOP_GLOBAL_SETTING WHERE CODE =N'fulltextsearch') BEGIN INSERT INTO dbo.ESHOP_GLOBAL_SETTING (CODE, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, SETTING_TYPE, SETTING_VALUE) VALUES(N'fulltextsearch', N'', 1, N'JSON_EVENT', NULL) END
